title.value: Potassium Sparing Diuretic Medications Value Set

description.value: This set of values contains Potassium Sparing Diuretic medications.

display.value: United States of America

purpose.value: Provide terminology for PDDI CDS (Potassium Sparing Diuretic + ACEi/ARB rule) FHIR resources
